item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: demoteam
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:

Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)

...or something like this:

The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.

As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Faq
item.dc:creator: demoteam
item.content:encoded:
FAQ

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

Bitcoin is the most stellar and most useful system of mutual trust ever devised.

What are some good metrics for cryptocurrencies?

Everyone seems to quote ‘market cap’ (price*total volume) but this seems to be of pretty limited value, particularly if you want to have a measure of the relative utility or use of a cryptocurrency. Can anyone suggest some alternative metrics? It seems that there’s an entire field here yet to be developed.

For what purpose do banks create their own cryptocurrencies?

Already at least severalcommercial bankshave created their owncryptocurrencies. Someinvestment fundsinvest part of their assets in selected cryptocurrencies. Recently, the investment bank JP Morgan has created its own cryptocurrency JPM Coin. Cryptocurrency JPM Coin will be used to settle initially a small part of the transaction, which JP Morgan performs on a daily basis for a total of about USD 6 billion.

In what applications, in addition to cryptocurrency, blockchain in your company, organization, country, etc.?

Blockchainis defined as a decentralized and distributeddatabasein the open source model in a peer-to-peerinternetnetwork without centralcomputersand without a centralizeddatastorage space, used to record individual transactions,paymentsor journal entries encoded usingcryptographicalgorithms.

Will Bitcoin or cryptocurrency be widely accepted?

Bitcoin and cryptocurrency has bloomed since 2009. Will it be accepted and regulated by the central bank to be used as trading mechanism in the near future? Albeit there has been minimal informal usage of Bitcoin in some trading.

What are the likely problems that cryptocurrency poses to the financial sector in the future?

How will general acceptance of cryptocurrency impact the financial sector and if not generally accepted, what will still happen?

What are some good metrics for cryptocurrencies?

Everyone seems to quote ‘market cap’ (price*total volume) but this seems to be of pretty limited value, particularly if you want to have a measure of the relative utility or use of a cryptocurrency. Can anyone suggest some alternative metrics? It seems that there’s an entire field here yet to be developed.

For what purpose do banks create their own cryptocurrencies?

Already at least severalcommercial bankshave created their owncryptocurrencies. Someinvestment fundsinvest part of their assets in selected cryptocurrencies. Recently, the investment bank JP Morgan has created its own cryptocurrency JPM Coin. Cryptocurrency JPM Coin will be used to settle initially a small part of the transaction, which JP Morgan performs on a daily basis for a total of about USD 6 billion.

In what applications, in addition to cryptocurrency, blockchain in your company, organization, country, etc.?

Blockchainis defined as a decentralized and distributeddatabasein the open source model in a peer-to-peerinternetnetwork without centralcomputersand without a centralizeddatastorage space, used to record individual transactions,paymentsor journal entries encoded usingcryptographicalgorithms.

Will Bitcoin or cryptocurrency be widely accepted?

Bitcoin and cryptocurrency has bloomed since 2009. Will it be accepted and regulated by the central bank to be used as trading mechanism in the near future? Albeit there has been minimal informal usage of Bitcoin in some trading.

What are the likely problems that cryptocurrency poses to the financial sector in the future?

How will general acceptance of cryptocurrency impact the financial sector and if not generally accepted, what will still happen?

Is it safe to invest massively in Bitcoin/cryptocurrency (or crypto currency)?

Is it safe to invest massively in Bitcoin/cryptocurrency (or crypto currency)? Many people are trying to invest much in cryptocurrency (or crypto currency). As a researcher and/or scholar, what are your suggestions/perspectives in this matter?

Anyone know, How does the bitcoin network know who is a solo miner and who is mining pool ? or it does not matter at all ?

In the context of cryptocurrency mining, amining poolis the pooling of resources by miners, who share their processing power over a network, to split the reward equally, according to the amount of work they contributed to the probability of finding a block.

What is the best framework to analyze the qualitative data, aiming to reduce the gap between the interests of the State and Activists?

Due to the policy of public ledger, blockchain has been found to be an emerging technology. Among other aspects, it has dragged attention majorly for serving a suitable domain for cryptocurrencies, where users’ authentication is being provided by the means of ECDSA.

What is the best framework to analyze the qualitative data, aiming to reduce the gap between the interests of the State and Activists?

We aim to analyze the data gathered from the interviews and focus groups, using a standard framework. We call for methods and frameworks applied in the literature to find the best practice for qualitative coding process.

are some good metrics for cryptocurrencies?","tab_content":"

Everyone seems to quote 'market cap' (price*total volume) but this seems to be of pretty limited value, particularly if you want to have a measure of the relative utility or use of a cryptocurrency. Can anyone suggest some alternative metrics? It seems that there's an entire field here yet to be developed.<\/p>","_id":"ec54aa6"},{"tab_title":"For what purpose do banks create their own cryptocurrencies?","tab_content":"

Already at least several\u00a0commercial banks<\/b><\/i>\u00a0have created their own\u00a0cryptocurrencies<\/b><\/i>. Some\u00a0investment funds<\/b><\/i>\u00a0invest part of their assets in selected cryptocurrencies. Recently, the investment bank JP Morgan has created its own cryptocurrency JPM Coin. Cryptocurrency JPM Coin will be used to settle initially a small part of the transaction, which JP Morgan performs on a daily basis for a total of about USD 6 billion.<\/p>","_id":"cdb2ba0"},{"tab_title":"In what applications, in addition to cryptocurrency, blockchain in your company, organization, country, etc.?","tab_content":"

Blockchain<\/b>\u00a0is defined as a decentralized and distributed\u00a0database<\/b>\u00a0in the open source model in a peer-to-peer\u00a0internet<\/b>\u00a0network without central\u00a0computers<\/b>\u00a0and without a centralized\u00a0data<\/b>\u00a0storage space, used to record individual transactions,\u00a0payments<\/b>\u00a0or journal entries encoded using\u00a0cryptographic<\/b>\u00a0algorithms.<\/p>","_id":"11d5280"},{"tab_title":"Will Bitcoin or cryptocurrency be widely accepted?","tab_content":"

Bitcoin and cryptocurrency has bloomed since 2009. Will it be accepted and regulated by the central bank to be used as trading mechanism in the near future? Albeit there has been minimal informal usage of Bitcoin in some trading.<\/p>","_id":"a6362dd"},{"tab_title":"What are the likely problems that cryptocurrency poses to the financial sector in the future?","tab_content":"

How will general acceptance of cryptocurrency impact the financial sector and if not generally accepted, what will still happen?<\/p>","_id":"7a1f26b"}],"title_color":"#000000","tab_active_color":"#DCB945","title_typography_typography":"custom","title_typography_font_family":"Montserrat","title_typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":16,"sizes":[]},"title_typography_font_weight":"600","title_typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":29,"sizes":[]},"icon_active_color":"#DCB945","icon_space":{"unit":"px","size":4,"sizes":[]},"content_color":"#7A7A7A","content_typography_typography":"custom","content_typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":16,"sizes":[]},"content_typography_font_weight":"400","content_typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":30,"sizes":[]},"title_typography_line_height_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"accordion"}],"isInner":true},{"id":"ad0c3af","elType":"column","settings":{"_column_size":50,"_inline_size":null,"border_radius":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"margin":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"15","isLinked":false},"margin_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"30","right":"10","bottom":"0","left":"10","isLinked":false},"padding":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false},"padding_mobile":{"unit":"px","top":"0","right":"0","bottom":"0","left":"0","isLinked":false}},"elements":[{"id":"c8201a2","elType":"widget","settings":{"tabs":[{"tab_title":"What are some good metrics for cryptocurrencies?","tab_content":"

Can anyone suggest some alternative metrics? It seems that there's an entire field here yet to be developed.<\/p>","_id":"ec54aa6"},{"tab_title":"For what purpose do banks create their own cryptocurrencies?","tab_content":"

Already at least several\u00a0commercial banks<\/b><\/i>\u00a0have created their own\u00a0cryptocurrencies<\/b><\/i>. Some\u00a0investment funds<\/b><\/i>\u00a0invest part of their assets in selected cryptocurrencies. Recently, the investment bank JP Morgan has created its own cryptocurrency JPM Coin. Cryptocurrency JPM Coin will be used to settle initially a small part of the transaction, which JP Morgan performs on a daily basis for a total of about USD 6 billion.<\/p>","_id":"cdb2ba0"},{"tab_title":"In what applications, in addition to cryptocurrency, blockchain in your company, organization, country, etc.?","tab_content":"

Blockchain<\/b>\u00a0is defined as a decentralized and distributed\u00a0database<\/b>\u00a0in the open source model in a peer-to-peer\u00a0internet<\/b>\u00a0network without central\u00a0computers<\/b>\u00a0and without a centralized\u00a0data<\/b>\u00a0storage space, used to record individual transactions,\u00a0payments<\/b>\u00a0or journal entries encoded using\u00a0cryptographic<\/b>\u00a0algorithms.<\/p>","_id":"11d5280"},{"tab_title":"Will Bitcoin or cryptocurrency be widely accepted?","tab_content":"

Bitcoin and cryptocurrency has bloomed since 2009. Will it be accepted and regulated by the central bank to be used as trading mechanism in the near future? Albeit there has been minimal informal usage of Bitcoin in some trading.<\/p>","_id":"a6362dd"},{"tab_title":"What are the likely problems that cryptocurrency poses to the financial sector in the future?","tab_content":"

How will general acceptance of cryptocurrency impact the financial sector and if not generally accepted, what will still happen?<\/p>","_id":"7a1f26b"},{"tab_title":"Is it safe to invest massively in Bitcoin\/cryptocurrency (or crypto currency)?","tab_content":"

Is it safe to invest massively in Bitcoin\/cryptocurrency (or crypto currency)? Many people are trying to invest much in cryptocurrency (or crypto currency). As a researcher and\/or scholar, what are your suggestions\/perspectives in this matter?<\/p>","_id":"74b11fc"},{"tab_title":"Anyone know, How does the bitcoin network know who is a solo miner and who is mining pool ? or it does not matter at all ?","tab_content":"

In the context of cryptocurrency mining, a\u00a0mining pool<\/b>\u00a0is the pooling of resources by miners, who share their processing power over a network, to split the reward equally, according to the amount of work they contributed to the probability of finding a block.<\/p>","_id":"8c21514"},{"tab_title":"What is the best framework to analyze the qualitative data, aiming to reduce the gap between the interests of the State and Activists?","tab_content":"

Due to the policy of public ledger, blockchain has been found to be an emerging technology. Among other aspects, it has dragged attention majorly for serving a suitable domain for cryptocurrencies, where users' authentication is being provided by the means of ECDSA.\u00a0<\/p>","_id":"6c763cb"},{"tab_title":"What is the best framework to analyze the qualitative data, aiming to reduce the gap between the interests of the State and Activists?","tab_content":"

\u00a0We aim to analyze the data gathered from the interviews and focus groups, using a standard framework. We call for methods and frameworks applied in the literature to find the best practice for qualitative coding process.<\/p>","_id":"8445ed6"}],"title_color":"#000000","tab_active_color":"#DCB945","title_typography_typography":"custom","title_typography_font_family":"Montserrat","title_typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":16,"sizes":[]},"title_typography_font_weight":"600","title_typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":29,"sizes":[]},"icon_active_color":"#DCB945","icon_space":{"unit":"px","size":4,"sizes":[]},"content_color":"#7A7A7A","content_typography_typography":"custom","content_typography_font_size":{"unit":"px","size":16,"sizes":[]},"content_typography_font_weight":"400","content_typography_line_height":{"unit":"px","size":30,"sizes":[]},"title_typography_line_height_tablet":{"unit":"px","size":28,"sizes":[]}},"elements":[],"widgetType":"accordion"}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":true}],"isInner":false}],"isInner":false}]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: demoteam
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Home
item.dc:creator: demoteam
item.content:encoded:
Welcome to our coin

Understanding block-chain makes you go mad, unless you start your own cult.

WHAT IS CRYPTOCURRENCY

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: demoteam
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start blogging!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
Hi, this is a comment. To delete a comment, just log in and view the post's comments. There you will have the option to edit or delete them.
